mapper.select: select id,projName,projNum,manager,createUser,createTime,updateUser,updateTime,isEnd,remark from project where id in (select distinct d.projid from defect d,defect_deal dd where d.id=dd.defectid and ((dd.dealuser = #{loginUser} or dd.nextuser = #{loginUser}) or d.handler = #{loginUser}))
mapper.update: update project set projName = #{projName}, projNum = #{projNum}, manager = #{manager}, updateUser = #{updateUser}, isEnd = #{isEnd}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
